alert.note: Alert for Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:08PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL SANTA ROSA COUNTY THROUGH 545 PM CDT... At 508 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Roeville, or 6 miles northeast of Milton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Point Baker and Roeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
